titleStmt.title: England's royal stone at the head of the corner, through the wonderful working of almighty God. Set forth in a sermon preached in the Cathedral church at Gloucester, the 28th day of June, being a day of publick and solemn thanksgiving for His Majesties happy restauration. By Joh. Nelme, M.A. and Pastor of S. Michaels in the said city.
titleStmt.author: Nelme, John, b. 1618 or 19.

titleStmt.title: England's royal stone at the head of the corner, through the wonderful working of almighty God.
